name: Gluttony (MadTFoxy)
description:
Our submission to GMTK Game Jam 2022!

Welcome to the world of the nearest future. The world where animals are harmed by no one! Welcome to the world of Gluttony. You’re Meatcube – one of the latest inventions in food industry. Meatcubes aren’t afraid of their fate to be a meal for someone... Are they?

Escape the meat processing plant! Save yourself from becoming someone’s meal!

Gluttony is a puzzle game where you play as dice that really wants to live! Whenever you roll, the level reacts depending on what side is up (odd or even): doors open and close, conveyors move you around and braziers roast you.

Controls:

W - Up

A - Left

S - Down

D – Right

Code by InnocentusLime (https://github.com/InnocentusLime)

Graphics by MadTFox (https://twitter.com/MadTeaFox1)

Music and sounds by Eric Matyas (https://soundimage.org/)
